text.section: This section applies only in Talbot County.

While confined in the Talbot County Jail, an inmate employed under § 11-602 of this title shall pay:
court-ordered payments for restitution; and
the cost of the food, lodging, and clothing of the inmate.

The County Council shall:
establish the per diem rate for the food, lodging, and clothing of an inmate; and
designate an agent to collect the costs specified in this section.
